import React from'react';import'./BaseInputField.css';function BaseInputField(props){var label=props.label,width=props.width,password=props.password,iduser=props.iduser,onChange=props.onChange,value=props.value,placeholder=props.placeholder,err=props.err;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"baseinput-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",{className:"baselabel"},label),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{className:err?"baseinput-error":"baseinput",style:{width:width}//specify width
